item.title: Mitch add a quote by Saul Bellow
item.description: "And I said to myself that unless you conceive Death to be a violent guerrilla and kidnaper who snatches those you love, and if you are not cowardly and cannot submit to such terrorism as civilized people now do in every department of life, you must pursue and inquire and explore every possibility and seek everywhere and try everything." -- Saul Bellow

item.title: Mitch add a quote by Saul Bellow
item.description: "Boredom is an instrument of social control. Power is the power to impose boredom, to command stasis, to combine this stasis with anguish. The real tedium, deep tedium, is seasoned with terror and with death." -- Saul Bellow
